name: How to Open a Locked Chest
name_original: How to Open a Locked Chest
description:
Have you ever been curious as to what's inside a locked chest? If so, this comprehensive guide is for you. This hyper realistic simulator will cover the ins and outs of opening what was once un-openable. 

It will not be an easy task, but if you ever want to see your friend again, I suggest you commit.
